name: akamai-waf
label: Akamai WAF
description: Akamai Web Application Firewall (WAF) is a cloud-based security solution designed to protect web applications from various cyber threats. It acts as a shield between internet traffic and web servers, inspecting incoming requests to detect and block malicious activities

operations.title: Create Network List
operations.description: Creates a new Network list on behalf of an authenticated user based on the parameters provided

parameters.title: Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Specify the Display name of the network list
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Display name of the network list

parameters.title: Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specify the Network list type, either IP for IP addresses and CIDR blocks, or GEO for two-letter country codes
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Network list type, either IP for IP addresses and CIDR blocks, or GEO for two-letter country codes

parameters.title: List of Elements
parameters.name: list
parameters.description: Specify the Elements (in a comma separated manner) to be added to the Network List
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Elements (in a comma separated manner) to be added to the Network List

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Specify the detailed Description of the Network List
parameters.tooltip: Specify the detailed Description of the Network List

parameters.title: Contract ID
parameters.name: contractId
parameters.description: Specify the Contract ID where you want to create the list
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Contract ID where you want to create the list

parameters.title: Group ID
parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Specify the Group ID where you want to create the list
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Group ID where you want to create the list

operations.title: Get Network List
operations.description: Retrieves all network lists available for an authenticated user based on the parameters provided

parameters.title: Search
parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Specify the List items to search in response list, Only list items that matches the specified substring in any network list's will be returned
parameters.tooltip: Specify the List items to search in response list, Only list items that matches the specified substring in any network list's will be returned

parameters.title: List Type
parameters.name: listType
parameters.description: Specify the list type with which you want to filter results. Filters the output to lists of only the given type of network lists if provided, either IP or GEO
parameters.tooltip: Specify the list type with which you want to filter results. Filters the output to lists of only the given type of network lists if provided, either IP or GEO

parameters.title: Extended
parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: If enabled, provides additional response data identifying who created and updated the list and when, and the network list's deployment status in both STAGING and PRODUCTION environments. This data takes longer to provide.
parameters.tooltip: If enabled, provides additional response data identifying who created and updated the list and when, and the network list's deployment status in both STAGING and PRODUCTION environments. This data takes longer to provide.

parameters.title: Include Elements
parameters.name: includeElements
parameters.description: If enabled, the response list includes all items. For large network lists, this may slow responses and yield large response objects
parameters.tooltip: If enabled, the response list includes all items. For large network lists, this may slow responses and yield large response objects
